text: The Damel are a Dardic group who live in Damel Valley, Chitral District, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan. Most Damels speak Dameli while others speak Gawar-Bati. They number around 8,300 and are Sunni Muslims.https://www.peoplegroups.org/explore/groupdetails.aspx?peid=6340#topmenu ==References== Category:Ethnic groups in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Category:Chitral District
title: Damel
